products.name: OPPO A7 (Glaze Blue, 3GB RAM, 64GB Storage)
products.product_description: A7 adopts the industry-first water drop screen design, backed by several technological advances, reflecting nature like a water droplet on the verge of dropping. Corning glass supports an 88.4 percent screen ratio, providing resistance to scratches
products.warranty_details: 1 year manufacturer warranty for device and 6 months manufacturer warranty for in-box accessories including batteries from the date of purchase

products.name: Canon EOS 1500D 24.1 Digital SLR Camera (Black) with EF S18-55 is II Lens, 16GB Card and Carry Case
products.product_description: All camera users, even beginners, will be able to capture amazing images and movies with this DSLR camera
products.warranty_details: 1 year manufacturer warranty for device and 6 months manufacturer warranty for in-box accessories including batteries from the date of purchase
